scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:orgai: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend:orgai
scripts.ci:prepare-lock: bash -lc 'if [ ! -f package-lock.json ]; then NPM_CONFIG_OPTIONAL=false npm i --package-lock-only --no-audit --no-fund; fi; sed -i "s#ssh://git@github.com/#https://github.com/#g" package-lock.json; sed -i "s#git@github.com:#https://github.com/#g" package-lock.json; sed -i "s#git://#https://#g" package-lock.json'
scripts.deps:rewrite-git: bash -lc 'if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then sed -i "s#ssh://git@github.com/#https://github.com/#g" package-lock.json && sed -i "s#git@github.com:#https://github.com/#g" package-lock.json && sed -i "s#git://#https://#g" package-lock.json; fi'
scripts.preinstall: bash -lc 'git config --global url."https://github.com/".insteadOf ssh://git@github.com/ && git config --global url."https://github.com/".insteadOf git@github.com: && git config --global url."https://".insteadOf git:// && if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then sed -i "s#ssh://git@github.com/#https://github.com/#g" package-lock.json && sed -i "s#git@github.com:#https://github.com/#g" package-lock.json && sed -i "s#git://#https://#g" package-lock.json; fi'
